com.google.template.soy.soytree
Interface SoyNode.LocalVarNode

All Superinterfaces:
Node, SoyNode
All Known Subinterfaces:
SoyNode.LocalVarBlockNode, SoyNode.LocalVarInlineNode
All Known Implementing Classes:
ForeachNonemptyNode, ForNode, GoogMsgNode, LetContentNode, LetNode, LetValueNode
Enclosing interface:
SoyNode
public static interface SoyNode.LocalVarNode
extends SoyNode

A node that adds a new local variable. The scope of the new local variable comprises either the children of this node or the younger siblings of this node.
